newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA-TALLINN STOCK EXCHANGE TRADING SYSTEM DOWN.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA-TALLINN STOCK EXCHANGE TRADING SYSTEM DOWN.

text.p: Tallinn stock exchange was again experiencing technical problems with its dealing system, dealers said on Wednesday.
"The exchange tried to open several times this morning but ran only for short periods and it is out again," one trader said.
The next attempt the get the bourse up and running was expected at 1100, one hour after the official opening time.
With increasing volumes, technical problems are more frequent this year and despite attempts to improve the system dealers are not noticing any improvements.
"What do you expect for a system that was set up on two million kroons but they will improve the system now that the bourse and its members are making money," the trader added.
